page.p:
Get the latest version of all server software, client software and documentation from the Lysator CVS. Login with
cvs -d :pserver:anonymous@cvs.lysator.liu.se:/xenofarm login
and just press return when prompted for password. Then type
cvs -d :pserver:anonymous@cvs.lysator.liu.se:/xenofarm co xenofarm
to get a fresh copy of Xenofarm.
